content.rendered: “1. Support HDCVI/AHD/TVI/CVBS/IP video inputs; 2. Full channel support analog / IP conversion, each channel up to 5MP IPC; 3. Support Smart H.264+ Code, it is applied to save up to 70% bandwidth and storage; 4. Support video diagnostic and IVS(Tripwire/Intrusion/Abandoned/Missing); 5. Support Micro SD card, maximum support 128G; 6. Support iSCSI extended storage function; 7. Support temperature alarm and resistance heating; 8. Support built-in 2.4G/5G Wi-Fi module or 4G module(optional); 9. Support ANR(Automatic Network Replenishment Technology); “

excerpt.rendered: Disini kami menjual NVS NVS0204HDC dengan tentunya dengan harga yang murah dan kualitas terbaik serta biaya pemasangan yang GRATIS! Untuk info lebih lanjut silahkan hubungi kami.
